pageAttributes.summary: I'm now almost two months into my new journey, and it's time to provide an update!...
After nearly 11 years at Red Hat it's time to move onto a new challenge...
It's been over a year since I first created this blog with the goal of posting more...
It's definitely weird to think that this is the first time I will have had a personal blog in the over 20 years that I've been working with technology of various kinds...
